content.raw:
Theres no gravity in the IMU readings! This is a plot of the IMU data. Top right plot is the acceloration reading: z should be -9.81:

![gazebo](http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013feb/imu_data/gazebo_imu_data.png)

Here is an example for real data from a $1800 MicroStrain IMU:
![real data](http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013feb/imu_data/real_imu_data_on_desk.png)

And the same sensor in real motion:
![imu](http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013feb/imu_data/real_imu_data_on_multisense_sl.png)
